MachineTranslationCaching.description: Boolean. Whether to enable caching for translation subpages.

MachineTranslationCachingTime.description: Integer. The time in seconds to cache translations for.

MachineTranslationRobotPolicy.description: String. The robot policy to use for translation subpages.

MachineTranslationServiceConfig.description: Array. Configure the machine translation service. type: <required, the name of the service, allowed values: DeepL, LibreTranslate>; url: <required, the API URL>; apikey: <optional, required if using DeepL, the API key for the machine translation service>

MachineTranslationSuppressLanguageCaptio.description: Boolean. Whether to suppress (disable) the language caption on translation subpages.

MachineTranslationTimeout.description: Integer. The time in seconds before connecting to the MachineTranslation instance will timeout.

MachineTranslationTranslateTitle.description: Boolean. Whether to also translate the page title. This will create an extra request to the translation API.

MachineTranslationUseJobQueue.description: Boolean. Whether to use the job queue for processing translations.
